TopicTitle: Different control settings for rockets and aircrafts

Articles.Content:
Hello, I would like to suggest this.

I would like to use a different control for rockets and aircrafts.

For example, I would like to use the A and D to control the roll of the aircraft, and the Q and E to control yaw (aircraft, of course).

At the same time I would like to use the standard controls for rockets.

Is it possible?

P.S. Sorry for my bad English
I don't see why it wouldn't be possible, and it would certainly be useful.

I'm used to the curent controls, and actually set other games to use it.

But that's a good idea.

Or maybe bind control settings? so you can do like ALT+number to switch between controls, and make your own controls for rovers, VTOL, planes, docking, ships... or that undescribeable weird craft with a spinned out command pod
